nodes.text: The WED 15 "Septoid 2" Treadwell toolkit droid, or WED-15 Septoid 2, was a model of WED Treadwell repair droid. Septoid 2s employed for use on Tatooine moisture farms would often chase sandflies, mistaking their whine for malfunctioning moisture vaporators.
The 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia mistakenly identifies the WED-15 Septoid Treadwell as a Septoid 2, which is contradicted by multiple other sources.
